Posts.Content: Hi Joan, I am on zometa infusion once a month and letrozole am just excepting the joint pains and numbness and stiffness is what I have to put up with, can I ask you have you had a Pet scan . You can read my profile for more info about me. Please feel free to ask any question. Daisy me
Posts.Title: Secondary cancers

Posts.Content: Hi Marilyn, I live in Dubai and use the site in the uk as I do not have support groups here. I have secondary breast cancer in my bones widespread
Posts.Title: Anybody here from the US or outside the UK?

Posts.Content: What injections are you on and how are you feeling now?
Posts.Title: new and scared...

Posts.Content: Hello I am sorry you have to be on here as nobody wants to by choice and I hope all goes well with your treatment. I am replying to you as I have secondary breast cancer that has gone to my bones, I know you did not mean any harm in your post, but you can imagine when you read something that says oh in the bones so to speak is not very positive for me, I don't mean to offend but it is not nice for me I hope you see where I am coming from. God health to you all the way.

Posts.Content: What is the latest situation re treatment etc? Hope all is good...
